QuestData.Title: Speak with the Ogre
QuestData.Description: <V'eru's voice fills your mind with crystalline tone and clarity.>$B$BThere is an ogre down in the Lower City, pleading for the assistance of passersby. They have all turned a deaf ear upon his plight.$B$BDo you think you might aid him?$B$BHis name is Grok, and he is sitting near the merchants to the southeast.$B$BThank you, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with the Ogre, Grok, in the Lower City section of Shattrath City.
QuestData.RewardText: You help Grok? Grok need help! Bloodmaul clan need help!
